_header: He liveth so much the easier

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Ne lyvethe so moche the easierwhoo to delightes was vsed
                    never
DULCosViii9.Note: Added to right margin sideways, bottom to top.
DULCosViii9.Facsimiles:
Burrow,  John,  and  A. I. Doyle, eds.  
             Thomas Hoccleve: A Facsimile of the Autograph Verse
                Manuscripts.
EETS
         s.s. 19 (2002).
